scripts.postinstall: concurrently npm:frontend:ci npm:backend:ci -n 'frontend:ci, backend:ci' -c blue,cyan && npm run generate
scripts.generate: concurrently npm:backend:generate -c cyan && concurrently npm:frontend:generate -c blue
scripts.start: concurrently npm:frontend npm:backend npm:codegen -n 'frontend, backend, codegen' -c blue,cyan,green
scripts.build: npm run generate && concurrently npm:backend:build -c cyan && concurrently npm:frontend:build -c blue
